struct.exostring:
Dialog Mission Statement:
Canderous encounters player wandering the undercity. Trooper initiates dialog. Players can speak to Canderous and then Rakghouls attack. After the attack Canderous and his men leave.
Exit point 1: Rakghouls attack. Canderous and Trooper 41 are invulnerable. Everyone else can be killed.
Exit point 2: Canderous and his men march off.
Canderous and his group march out of the Undercity
Rakghouls spawn in and attack. Canderous and DavikTroop041 are invulnerable. Everyone else is vulnerable.
